titleStmt.title: The merry conceited lasse, vvhose hearts desire was set on fire, a husband for to have; in hope that he would certainly, maintaine her fine and brave. To a pleasant new northerne tune.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

publicationStmt.publisher: For Thomas Lambert, at the signe of the Hors-shoo in Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Verse: "I am a young woman and faine I would haue ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
